experiences.title: Neumont College of Computer Science
experiences.location: Bachelor of Science in Web Design and Development
experiences.description: Key Courses: Interactive Web Development (JavaScript), Dynamic and Scripting Languages (Ruby), Development in Third Party Frameworks (Python), Intro into Dynamic Web Programming (ASP.net/C#), Front-End Implementation, Advanced Web Scripting (Angular and React), Human Computer Interface Design (UI/UX), Principles of Software Engineering (Scrum/Agile), Software Design Principles, Mobile App Development (Android Studio), Media Design Tools (Adobe Creative Cloud)
